content.text:
# Draft:Conrad Warren

----
Conrad Warren is the previous husband of well known Indonesian actress and TV personality Marissa Nasution whom he married in 2014. and divorced in 2016.
Conrad Warren is Director of several Singapore registered companies including  Maleo Assets Management, Maleo Holdings (FKA Ethos Advisors Fareast), Maleo Capital Management.
He is also the Managing Director of Indonesian Proptech company Briix and several other Indonesian entities together with his Business Partner, David Anderson whose assets recently got frozen by ASIC under an interim order issued on 28 Feb 2025, which was later followed by a wound up decision. Conrad Warren denies being linked to the Falcon scheme via his own press release despite the same investment scheme (with both David Anderson and Conrad Warren listed as Managing Directors of the fund) having been replicated and submitted to the SEC to raise funds from US retail investors under a fund called Sphiinx Opportunity Fund II.
He is related to Maria (Mayee) Waren (his mother) who teaches at the University of Technology in Sydney, Australia and previously worked at the United Nations Office on Drug and Crime
He now lives with his second wife in Bali with whom he's had 2 children.
References
